Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of a production line compared to its maximum potential output.
he rate at which products are produced and processed through the production system.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.FORMULA: Total Units Produced / Total Production Time

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.EXPLANATION: The total time from the beginning to the end of a production process for a single product.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.FORMULA: Total Time to Produce One Unit

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products that pass quality inspection without requiring rework.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.FORMULA: (Number of Units Passing Inspection on First Attempt / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.EXPLANATION: The percentage of production time lost due to machine or process downtime.
The percentage of materials or products that are discarded due to defects or errors.
Measures the output of products per labor hour.
The percentage of products that fail to meet quality standards.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Assembly Lin.FORMULA: (Number of Defective Units / Total Units Produced) * 100
